rooms.description: Spacious entrance hall with traditional Kerala-style wooden carvings and murals, serving as a reception area.
rooms.vastu: Vastu compliant: North for entrance to bring prosperity.

rooms.description: Large living area with an open concept kitchen adjoining it. Traditional Kerala architecture with stone flooring and wooden ceilings.
rooms.vastu: East is ideal for social interactions.

rooms.description: Well-equipped kitchen with modern amenities integrated into a traditional design. Includes a dining area.
rooms.vastu: South-east is favorable for cooking and fire.

rooms.description: Open dining space adjoining the kitchen. Traditional Kerala style with tiled flooring.
rooms.vastu: North-east is beneficial for gathering and family meals.

rooms.description: Cozy family room with traditional decor. Features a Kerala-style woodwork and tiled floors.
rooms.vastu: South-west area is good for relaxation.

rooms.description: Spacious balcony attached to Bedroom 1 providing a view of the landscape.
rooms.vastu: Balconies in south-west help in stress relief.

rooms.description: Master bedroom with an attached balcony and private ensuite bathroom. Incorporates traditional Kerala elements.
Spacious bedroom with an attached balcony. Traditional Kerala design with woodwork.
rooms.vastu: Balconies and south-west placements promote relaxation.

rooms.description: Well-lit bedroom with a private balcony. Decor includes traditional Kerala motifs.
rooms.vastu: East is considered ideal for bedrooms.

rooms.description: Additional bedroom with a balcony. Features Kerala-style wooden detailing.
rooms.vastu: North-east is positive for personal growth and learning.

rooms.description: Spacious bedroom with an adjacent balcony. Traditional Kerala design with murals.
rooms.vastu: North-west area is peaceful and suitable for bedrooms.

rooms.description: Well-ventilated bedroom with a private balcony. Traditional Kerala style and wooden accents.
Dedicated gym area designed with traditional Kerala elements and modern fitness equipment. Soundproofing incorporated.

openings.description: Large wooden entrance door with traditional Kerala motifs. Provides an inviting entry.

openings.description: A large window offering natural light and ventilation in the living room area.
